_description: William Dunbar, ‘Complaint to the King against Mure’ — four 7-line stanzas

CULLl510.First Lines:
Sir I complaine of Iniuriesa ryseing sone of rakyng
                    muris…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…That ladis may baitt him lyk a buillffor þat to me war
                    sum remeid
CULLl510.Note:
4 x 7, aabbcbc, with last line always ending
                    ‘remeid’.

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Schir I complane off Iniurisa refing svnne off rakyng
                    Muris…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…That Ladis may bait him lyk a buillfor that to me war sum
                    remeid
